string.text: Well who have we got here?!
Listen, I need 3 medkits. Can you deliver? I'll pay of course. So, what you say?
Ok, I've updated my position on your PDA.
Then why did you ask? Ok, never mind then.
Please, bring me 2 antirads, I`m not feeling too good. I'll pay of course. What do you say?
Sure, no problem, be there soon.
Ok, I've added my position to your PDA.
Finally someone offering help. I need water and food, please bring me two bottles of mineral water and two kolbasa and I'll pay you for your help.
Thanks! I've added my position to your PDA.
It's my turn to buy the drinks tonight, but I don't have time to get them. Can you get me 4 bottles of vodka and 4 energy drinks?
Ok, I`ll get them as soon as I can.
Thanks! I've added my position to your PDA.
My pistol just broke, and someone stole my shotgun, so if you can bring me a working PM and BM16 short, I`ll pay you kindly.
Ok, I`ll be there as soon as I can.
Thanks! I've added my position to your PDA.
Anything in particular that you are in need of?
Been hunting boars all day and run out of ammo. Any chance of getting me 4 boxes of 9x18 fmj rounds and 4 boxes of 12 x 70 buckshot cartridges?
Ok, I've updated my position on your PDA.
Can I help you get anything?
I need two F1 grenades, if you can get them.
Ok, I'll see what I can dig up.
Ok, I've updated my position on your PDA.
I lost my damn silencer, can you rustle me up one?
Ok, I'll see what I can do.
Ok, I've updated my position on your PDA.
Any chance of getting me one of those ACOG scopes?, I've always wanted one.
Ok, I'll see what I can do.
Ok, I've updated my position on your PDA.
I want one of those suits the bandits wear, I'll give you 2000 RU ?.
Ok, I'll see if I can get one.
Ok, I've updated my position on your PDA.
I'm looking for a stone blood artefact, not rare i know but I`m lazy, I'll give you 1200 RU if you bring me one OK?.
Ok, I'll see if I can find one.
Ok, I've updated my position on your PDA.
I want a stone flower artefact, if you find me one its worth 2700 RU to you.
Ok, I'll see if I can find one.
Ok, I've updated my position on your PDA.
My friend is looking for a Gravi artefact, 2700 RU to you if you find me one.
Ok, I'll see if I can find one.
Ok, I've updated my position on your PDA.
Can I get something for you?
One of those jellyfish thingies ,always wanted one. 1200 RU interested?
Ok, I'll see if I can find one.
Damn, those things are everywhere, get one yourself!
Ok, I've updated my position on your PDA.
I need a soul artefact ,can you get one for say 5500 RU?
Why don't you get one yourself!
Ok, I've updated my position on your PDA.
Hmmm, could do with a meat chunk artefact, 3000 RU?
Nah, lifes too short, get one yourself!
Ok, I've updated my position on your PDA.
I need an izloms hand, don't even ask why, I`ll give you 1500 RU?
Ok, I've updated my position on your PDA.
Actually I'm looking for a cats head, I`ll give you 1000 RU, what do you say?
No thanks, I don't need the money at the moment.
Ok, I've updated my position on your PDA.
Yes, I`ll give you 1800 RU for a pseudodog tail?
Ok, I`ll bring you one as soon as I find it.
No thanks, I don't need the money at the moment.
Ok, I've updated my position on your PDA.
Hmmm, I was just off to get some water, but I`ll give you 200 RU if you bring me 4 bottles?
Ok, I`ll bring them as soon as I have them.
No thanks, I don't need the money at the moment.
Ok, I've updated my position on your PDA.
Yes please, seems the gas hasnt fully cleared from this place, can you get me 3 gasmasks, I`ll pay 1000 a piece?
Ok, I`ll bring them as soon as I have them.
No thanks, I don't need the money at the moment.
Ok, I've updated my position on your PDA.
I want the tentacles off one of those bastard bloodsucking abominations, I`ll pay 3500?
No thanks, I don't need the money at the moment.
Ok, I've updated my position on your PDA.
Anything you guys need around here?
My detector just broke, I need a new one. No crap though, needs to be top of the line. I`ll give you 1600 for one?
No thanks, I don't need the money at the moment.
Ok, I've updated my position on your PDA.
Pity, now I`ll have to go find one...
We need a mica artefact for 5500, you game?
No thanks, I don't need the money at the moment.
Ok, I've updated my position on your PDA.
A shame really, cant get help these days...
I need a new rifle. I`ll give you 9500 for a groza?
Ok, I've updated my position on your PDA.
I need some ammo. 4 boxes of 5.56x45 ss190 for say 1500?
Ok, I've updated my position on your PDA.
I could really do with some ammunition, say 3 boxes of 9x39 pab9 for 1000?
Ok, I've updated my position on your PDA.
Damn you asked at the right time. Me and my mates are hungry, please bring four cans of sardines, I`ll give you 1000?
Ok, I've updated my position on your PDA.
Yes, good timing stalker, I've run out of antidotes, and if I`m caught in a blowout, wel, you know... I`ll give you 12000 for 2?
Ok, I've updated my position on your PDA.
Can you get me 4 F1 grenades? I`ll pay 200 a piece.
Ok, I've updated my position on your PDA.
I've heard you have some spare things ...
I have 3 spare medkits, 210 RU for each, what you say?
Ok, I've updated my position on your PDA.
Then why did you ask? Ok, never mind then.
Anything you want to get off your hands?
I have 2 antirads, 225 RU for each, yes?
Ok, I've updated my position on your PDA.
Then why are you wasting my time?
I have a new PM going for 300 RU, are you keen?
Ok, I've updated my position on your PDA.
Then what did you buzz me for?
I have a BM16 going for 500 RU, interested?
Ok, I've updated my position on your PDA.
Then what the hell do you want?
You have anything good for sale?
I have a 4x bandages and 1x medkit for 500 RU, interested?
Ok, I've updated my position on your PDA.
Then what the hell do you want?
I have a novice outfit I'm selling for 1200 RU, are you interested?
No thanks, it's a bit pricy for me.
Ok, I've updated my position on your PDA.
Well you won't get one cheaper anywhere!
Anything you looking to get rid of?
I have a jellyfish artefact I'm selling for 2300 RU, are you interested?
No thanks, it's a bit pricy for something so common.
Ok, I've updated my position on your PDA.
I have a gravi artefact I'm selling for 5000 RU, are you interested?
No thanks, it's a bit expensive.
Ok, I've updated my position on your PDA.
I have a bandit outfit just for you, very cheap, only 2500 RU?
No thanks, it's a bit expensive.
Ok, I've updated my position on your PDA.
I have a "Sunrise-5" outfit for only 5000 RU. Don't delay, it wont last at this price!
Ok, I've updated my position on your PDA.
I have a droplets artefact for 2300?
Ok, I've updated my position on your PDA.
Sure, I have a stone blood for 2300, interested?
Ok, I've updated my position on your PDA.
Yes, a mutant cats head for 1100
Ok, I've updated my position on your PDA.
I`m selling a pseudo dog tail for 1800?
Ok, I've updated my position on your PDA.
Ok, I've updated my position on your PDA.
I`m selling a repair kit for 7500 ru
Ok, I've updated my position on your PDA.
I`m selling 2 gas masks for 1100 each
Ok, I've updated my position on your PDA.
I`m selling a soul artefact for 8000 ru if you're keen?
Ok, I've updated my position on your PDA.
Ok, I've updated my position on your PDA.
Hey man, I have a potent antidote for a cool 7000 man
Ok man, like, I've updated my position on your PDA man.
Do you have anything for sale?
I have 4 F1 grenades spare for say 1100?
Ok man, like, I've updated my position on your PDA man.
Do you have anything for sale?
I have 4 cans of sardines for 1100?
What the hell would i do with all those sardines??.
Ok man, like, I've updated my position on your PDA man.
Sure, I know a few things that others don't ... for a price of course.
Nah, I don't need to know.
It'll cost you 100 Ru. I've updated my position on your PDA.
Then why did you ask? Ok, never mind then.
Actually I've changed my mind. Let's meet.

Not far from here the fellows in uniform needed something. They didn't used to come here - cleared everything out spick-n-snap before me, right down to cutting down the cables. And now it seems they found...I couldn't get even close to the building - they noticed me right away and started shooting. Glad I made it out without a hold in my hide.
Hey, not much. By the way, a friend of mine told me this quiz and I dunno what he meant. Can you help?
Ok, then listen: "There is an ancient invention still used in some parts of the world today that allows people to see through walls. What is it?"
Hey, that makes sense. Thanks man.
Can you tell me a joke, I need cheering up!

A Doctor enters a hospital room where a heavily injured stalker is recovering after a nasty accident in an anomaly "Hello doc. So, how does it look?" asks the Stalker. "Well, I did all I could" says the Doc "but unfortunately I had to amputate both of your legs." The Stalker is shocked "Oh my God, that's horrible! My legs!" He yells. "Hey, look at the bright side" replies the Doc "at least now your dick reaches all the way to the ground!"
I need cheering up, know any good jokes?

A Freedomer was on night watch. He gets up onto the watch tower and to kill a bit of time, he rolls himself a joint, smokes it, then is all relaxed and loosely leans against the railings of the tower and stares into the night sky. After a while a large fire ball of light arcs across the sky, casting shadows on the landscape. He jumps up and thinks "Whoooa! What the hell was that?". Not long after, another ball of fire flies by. "Holy shit, what's goin' on?" he thinks. Just then, another watchman grabs his shoulder and says "Hey man don't you need a break? You've been up for two days already!"
Hey man, what's good in the hood?

I think the zone is some kind of punishment for humanity and one day it will swallow the whole planet. And you know what ? I think it will be a good thing. It will surely bring down that whole system of corruption and greedy politicians and everything. No governments, no money, just freedom.
Ok well good luck with that.

I read a book by Santos Bonachi, this guy is crazy, he pretty much found out that the bible is a book about astrology, and the whole Christianity is used to control people while its original purpose was to worship the sun, planets, universe and humans' inner power. Isn't that crazy?
Hey man, what can you say for yourself?

Man I like it here.... I don't have to do anything if I don't want to. But it's better to keep yourself busy. I feel better if I participate. Lying around is just one way to get killed. Or to die bored to death ....hehehe.
Hey man, what's on your mind?
I wonder what would happen to a bloodsucker if I kicked it in it's crotch... Does it even have balls or anything at all down there?
Sure, good idea bro. Do you want me to let you know how it goes?
Oh yes definitely, I won't sleep until your reply....
Hey man, find out anything interesting lately?

Did you know that water reaches boiling point at a mere 82`C in the zone? I have no Idea how it is possible because similar effects can only be measured in low pressure less dense atmosphere on top of the highest mountains, yet here it seems water behaves this way even without the required atmospheric conditions.
Very interesting indeed, now if we can just find out why...
Hey man, find out anything interesting lately?
We have discovered 167 entirely new and unique bacteria species that developed in the human gut under these conditions.
Hey man, find out anything interesting lately?
Metallic objects in some areas of sector 12 are display fluctuating conductive properties.
Hey man, find out anything interesting lately?

We have discovered several areas with somehow unstable gravitational field. That fact alone yet again puts in question all we know so far about gravity! It may not even be related to density of matter, but rather something entirely different! Higgs boson experiment is a nice example of that.
The whole zone is unstable for me.
True, but this is particularly interesting.
I heard some guys from our unit talk about how it would be nice to make peace with every faction here, to create one united stalker faction. I would shoot them for treason if it was up to me...
Yeah, you show them who's boss!
Someone has to put them in their place.

We need to get some of those choppers like the army has. Then we could purge this place right down to the rats... I know there is lot of them lying around, but they are wrecked and are freakin' glowing...
Yeah, but fuel is hard to come by in the zone.
Yes, which begs the question where do they get it from?
Hey man, I could really use a good joke now.

A Dutier was jumping on top of an old hatch. With each jump he yelled: "9!" A Freedomer passing by noticed this unusual behavior and stopped and observed for a while, then finally asked "What the hell are you doing man?" The Dutier answered: "Well I'm jumping on this old hatch yelling 9. It's really fun, here give it a try!" and steps down. The Freedomer got on the hatch and started jumping yelling: "9-9-9..." When all of a sudden, the Dutier kicked open the hatch under the Freedomer's feet and he fell into a pit below. The Dutier closed the again, stepped on top of it, and started jumping yelling: "10! 10! 10!..."
Sorry man, I`m just not funny.

Duty and the military are competing with each other who can create the best, cutting edge paratrooper shoes. The military present their boots. Their volunteer trooper, equipped with their latest prototypes, leaps out of a ten story building. As he hits the ground, the boots explode, creating ripples in the concrete. He stands up, beaten and bruised, one leg broken, but he survived. "See! Special kinetic bleeders destroyed the shoes in order to assure the survival of our operative" says the military representative. Then Duty presents their boots. Their paratrooper leaps out of a fifteen story building. When he hits the ground, he explodes into a pile of guts and bones. "See!" says the Duty representative proudly "Our boots are perfectly intact! Good as new!"

Bloodsuckers are stalking a herd of boars, when another bloodsucker runs up to them with his whole mouth bloody. Braggingly he asks "Hey, do you see that grey boar over there? Well I sucked it till it fainted!" After a short while, another bloodsucker runs up to to them with his whole head bloody and asks "Do you guys see that large alpha male over there? I sucked it totally dry man, not one drop of blood left in it!" A third bloodsucker arrives with his whole body coverd in blood "Hey, do you see that Whirligig anomaly over there?" he asks "Well I didn't!"

A Merc goes to the toilet for a piss. Right next to him is a Soldier. When the Merc finishes and is on his way out, the Soldier says "We Soldiers wash our hands when we leave the toilet!" To which the Merc answers "We Mercs don't piss on our hands..."
Got anything that will make me laugh?

Four bandits, with a concrete drainage tube section on their shoulders, run right through a military outpost. "Damn bandits, steal everything and get more brazen by the day. Now they don't even try to sneak things out anymore. Shoot one as warning!" A soldier shoots one, and rest of them collapse on the side of the road. A controller climbs out of the tube mumbling "God damn army bullies! I finally get a new car and they already shoot out my tire!"
LMFAO, that's the best I`ve heard in a long time.

I gotta neat plan man.. listen! I'm gonna domesticate little puppies of pseudo dogs and I'm gonna train them, teach them tricks and shit and I'm gonna have them on rusty old chains and they gonna keep my ass safe ! And who pisses me off, I just whistle and they tear him to pieces ... mh hehe ... yea ... rest in pieces!
Ok, let me know how that works out for you...

My group once wondered into the swamps... Some guy told us that there are floating golden orbs....heh! Golden... It was sparkling balls of fire! And they were chasing our asses and spawning flames in midair... golden orbs... I'm gonna kick his golden orbs when I meet him again ...idiot ... So pretty much avoid swamps if you can...
It's you! You owe me money! And if you don't you do now.... I'll find you! I know where you live man, and I know what you look like now!
How about I gut you with a spoon?
Er...um...sorry bro, thought you were someone else, see ya.
Our brotherhood is protecting sacred places of the zone. We were chosen by a power infinitely greater than us! It is an enormous honor to be amongst warriors of the monolith.

Monolith showed me that this is just an illusion! Virtual reality, if you will, where consciousness is having an experience. However, I don't feel virtual.... I wonder what it wanted me to see. Strange visions... I know .... it sounds ridiculous.
Ridiculous? Nah, a few other words come to mind though...
The Zone was created by Monolith to judge human kind. It will soon judge the whole of creation and then men will become one with the almighty monolith for monolith is a god descended on the earth.
Monolith keeps our flames eternal. Keeping us safe from beasts of the night and of the day. No seriously, our campfires literally never extinguish...like...ever..... Hallowed be the Monolith!
He must like me too because my fires never burn out either...
